actionfx-core
  • All Classes
 

Package com.github.actionfx.core.bind

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Binding
    Interface for different type of bindings.
    BindingTargetResolver
    Interface for resolving a field into a control that acts as a binding target.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBinding<S,​T>
    Abstract base class for different binding implementations.
    AbstractCachingBindingTargetResolver
    Abstract base class of a BindingTargetResolver implementation that supports an internal caching.
    BindingModelProxy
    Proxy around a model class that is used for form binding.
    BindingTarget
    Describes a desired binding between a Control and a value inside a JavaBean.
    MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver
    Implementation of a BindingTargetResolver that uses an internal mapping for field names (also nested fields are supported) to control IDs for resolving to a control.
    NameBasedBindindTargetResolver
    Implementation of a BindingTargetResolver that looks for controls whose ID is starting with the field name to resolve.
    ObservableListBinding<E>
    Binding implementation that binds a target ObservableList to a source List.
    ObservableValueBinding<S,​E>
    Binding implementation that binds an ObservableValue to another BeanPropertyReference.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BindingType
    Describes the internal binding type that will be established.
